channel.name: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb

messages.subject: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Hi Sophia, Thanks again for your time last week. I've attached the formal proposal for the Sales Suite Upgrade. It includes the AI enhancement bundle and reflects the 8% discount we discussed. Let

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Hi Bruce, Appreciate the quick turnaround. This looks aligned overall — I'll forward it to our RevOps lead and circle back with any questions. Regards, Sophia On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:59 PM Bruce

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Hi Sophia, Just wanted to check if your team had a chance to review the proposal. We're flexible on start dates if that helps align internally. Cheers, Bruce

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Hey Bruce, Just got some initial feedback. They're mostly aligned — only question was whether implementation support is included in the first month. – Sophia On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 4:01 PM Bruce

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Yes — full onboarding and implementation support are included for the first 30 days at no extra cost. I'll highlight that in a revised version. Also happy to get on Slack if that's easier for

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: That helps a lot, thank you. Feel free to send the updated doc. And yes — let's move this to Slack, it's faster for us at this point. I've sent you a dm on slack. Thanks, Sophia On Mon, Jul

messages.subject: Re: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb
messages.text: Got the invite — thank you. Uploading the revised version now. Looking forward to wrapping this up smoothly. Talk soon, Bruce On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 4:02 PM Sophia Nguyen <sophia.nguyen.airbnb2025@

summary: Sales rep Bruce Wayne sent a Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade proposal to prospect Sophia Nguyen. Sophia sought clarification on implementation support, which Bruce promptly confirmed was included. The conversation is now transitioning to Slack for faster communication to finalize the deal.
